name: Extreme Hopscotch
description:
'Extreme Hopscotch' is a casual game, where you make choices to shape your life. It has been developed as a part of 'GAMEHIGHED Jam 2021' in about 12 hours.

First you need to drag and release the token (with mouse) to throw it on top of one of the tiles. These tiles are some steps/days/memories/choices through your life. Then all you need to do is to pick an answer reflecting you (with keyboard either key '1' or '2'). You have a time limit of 2 minutes to go through questions and live your life fully. At the end you see how 'well' & 'yolo' you lived your only life.
